summary: The diff adds documentation for a chat-based export format and reconstruction guide, and it also modifies multiple frontend UI/components (e.g., dashboard news card and sidebar). However, it does not implement the core BuildRequest requirement of delivering the complete frontend+backend source code and step-by-step reconstruction/run instructions directly in the chat output; instead it adds/updates repository files and UI content.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deliver the complete project source code (frontend + backend) directly in the chat in a copy/paste-friendly, file-by-file format with paths and full contents.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows added documentation and a truncated summary file; it does not provide the complete repository code file-by-file (including backend code) in chat, nor does it show changes that would cause chat to output the entire codebase.

missing_requirements.requirement: Include clear, step-by-step instructions (in chat) for reconstructing the project locally, env var setup from existing .env example files, and copy-paste-ready commands to run frontend and backend.
missing_requirements.reason: While a reconstruction guide file appears to be added, the BuildRequest requires these instructions to be included in the chat output. The diff does not show chat-delivered instructions, and the added guide content is truncated and does not demonstrate referencing the existing example .env files or providing full run commands.

hallucinated_features.description: Added internal documentation files describing a chat export format and reconstruction guide.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest asks to deliver code and instructions directly in chat, not to add new documentation files to the repository.

hallucinated_features.description: UI/content changes to the dashboard news card (mock news content, demo badge, disclaimer text) and sidebar navigation structure/behavior changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly state not to add new product features or change existing application behavior/UI as part of this request, but the diff modifies UI components with new content and navigation items/behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated meta summary files describing broad frontend changes (auth context switch, new pages, footer copy, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: These changes are not requested by REQ-66/REQ-67, which are solely about delivering the existing complete code and reconstruction instructions in chat (and avoiding behavior/UI changes).
